title: New Client installation won't happen..
body: I've had the new client, but my pc broke a while back and I ended up reinstalling league of legends and playing the old client for some time. Only when I go to install the new client now directly through the launch menu, I click upgrade now and nothing happens. So when I click 'launch' (thegame) it says something isn't working and I must retry, but that pop up happens every time so I have to reinstall my client again completely for me to access the game. Any ideas on the problem?

replies.body: It sounds like your PC isn't allowing the patcher to prepare for the updated client, so nothing's happening.  While it would help to get a clear message of the error, I suspect that it's giving you a permissions error.  In this case, try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help with making sure access is being allowed.  Let me know if that does the trick!
